Name: Color Slots
About the game: Color Slots is a speed puzzle runner. You help the rolling ball pass through the colored blocks. By pressing the colored buttons at the right moment, you move the shapes upward of the corresponding color. Upon collision with a figure, the game will start over. Your task is to drive far and not collide with figures. Good luck with the game.
